Class ProductController

  • Method Details

    • getProducts

      @GetMapping("/products") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<ProductVO>> getProducts()
      The end point for GET {url}/products
      Returns:
      a json list of all the products

    • getProduct

      @GetMapping("/products/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProductVO> getProduct​(@PathVariable("id") @Min(value=0L,message="The id must be positive") @javax.validation.constraints.Min(value=0L, message="The id must be positive") long id)
      The end point for GET {url}/products/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - Product id
      Returns:
      a json containing the product info and status 200 if the product is found or status 204 if the product is not found

    • getProducts

      @GetMapping(value="/products", params="search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<ProductVO>> getProducts​(@RequestParam java.lang.String search)
      The end point for GET {url}/products?search={pattern}
      Parameters:
      search - Pattern to search
      Returns:
      a json list of all the products matching the pattern

    • addProduct

      @PostMapping("/products") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProductVO> addProduct​(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ProductVO newProduct)
      The end point for POST {url}/products/
      Parameters:
      newProduct - a json containing the info for the new product
      Returns:
      If the product is created successfully then status 201 and the product info is returned, otherwise it returns status 400

    • updateProduct

      @PutMapping("/products/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProductVO> updateProduct​(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestBody ProductVO modifiedProduct)
      The end point for PUT {url}/products/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - Product id
      modifiedProduct - a json containing the info for the modified product
      Returns:
      status 200 if the product is found and updated or status 204 if the product is not found

    • deleteProduct

      @DeleteMapping("/products/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProductVO> deleteProduct​(@PathVariable("id") long id)
      The end point for DELETE {url}/products/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - Product id
      Returns:
      status 200 if the product is found and deleted or status 204 if the product is not found

    • onConstraintViolationException

      @ExceptionHandler(javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> onConstraintViolationException​(javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException cve)
      Exception handler
      Parameters:
      cve - Constraint Violation Exception
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity response with a 400 bad request status and a message

    • onMethodArgumentNotValidException

      @ExceptionHandler(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> onMethodArgumentNotValidException​(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException manve)
      Exception handler
      Parameters:
      manve - Method Argument Not Valid Exception
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity response 400 bad request status
